attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Car accidents victims claiming compensation for injury and loss have no rights to the data protection act, the human rights act, disability discrimination act and equal rights act. Claimants fighting for compensation are being let down by a system which is failing to compensate victims financially as if the accident never occured. Victims are being persecuted in court by an unfair court systems, unfair cross examination and unfair court hearings. Victims are left with disabilites, ill health, unemployed and in debt.
